Name: Basher
Description: A towering triple-barrelled turret manned by three tiny fires. Locks onto Navis and fires dangerous explosive rounds.

Name: Beetank
Description: Beetanks are short and stout artillery units that scuttle about before lining up their arcing explosive shots. They donâ€™t need line of sight on a target to fire a barrage.

Name: Boomer
Description: Boomers fire the massive boomerang they carry in their jaws, which flies around the arena and back to their maw.

Name: Catack
Description: Catack Viruses ride around in tiny tanks, firing their devastating cannons at whatever gets in their sights.

Name: Canodumb
Description: These mounted turrets track enemies with their holographic reticules. They can be mounted on ceilings, floors, and even walls.

Name: Flicker
Description: Flicker Viruses look like geometric rainbow birds. They flit about, launch storms of feathers, and manipulate their songs to mimic voices.

Name: Handy
Description: Handy Viruses meld into floors, walls, and ceilings, disappearing and reappearing elsewhere with bombs at hand.

Name: HardHead
Description: HardHead Viruses lob element-spreading shells. Their color changes with their ammo.
